Key Match Events: Alec Bohm's three-run homer in the fourth inning ripped open the game.
Alec Bohm had four hits and four RBIs in the game.
Post-Match Reflections: Manager Rob Thomson thanked his players and credited the staff members.
Alec Bohm emphasized the importance of putting the bat on the ball and swinging at good pitches.
Manager Rob Thomson reflected on the team's journey and the goal to win the World Series.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Phillies had a toast filmed for social media after their 12-2 win over the New York Mets.
The Phillies have made the postseason for three straight years, a rare achievement in franchise history.
Bryson Stott compared the current team's situation to previous years, highlighting the progress made.
